block_comment: This block of Verilog RTL code is responsible for triggering the end of a start shift operation. The "StartShiftWillEnd" wire is set high if either the last byte has been received or all the following conditions are met: a valid reception ("RxValid"), end of frame ("RxEndFrm"), all bits in the received byte count ("&RxByteCnt") are 1, and the reception window is enabled ("RxEnableWindow").
